entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 03 March 2023
